ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Visits a New Youth Cult; Cracked Commercial No. 482; When Computers Take Over Everywhere...; Newly-Created Jobs for Today's Modern Age; Video Nut the Magazine for Game Addicts; Fancy Work Titles... and the Actual Jobs; Absent-Minded Answers to Simple-Stated Statements; Hee-Man, Mister of the Universe If He Came Down to Earth...; A Cracked Look at TV Commercials You'll Never Get to See; Cracked's More Practical Tranzformer-Type Toys; Cracked Ways to Make Ends Meat; If the Boy George Craze Spreads Everywhere...; Old Movie Monster Films Updated for Today
ComicInfo.Summary: How to save money against the rising cost of meat.
